about_the_game:
Somewhere in a top secret lab there was an incident, an incident that could effect your entire universe... if you let it. One second ago you were a security guard on the office level but now you are the only thing left pushing back on the collapse of the universe. You don't know what's to come, all you know is... DON'T LET THEM OUT

Enough of that, realistically, you (the player) are more interested in running away from a funny picture producing a loud noise. Both the picture and the noise are your choice, not ours. Yes we may regret giving the player that much power but that is a problem for later us, for now you can have all the fun in the world running away from whatever you please.

Gameplay Features:


-In Depth First Person Movement System
Complete with mantling, sliding, wall touch, and auto-crawling. Auto-crawling is where you automatically go into a prone stance while crouching into small places. This is helpful due to the game's fast pace.

-Image Upload System
This allows you to upload an image of your choice via file or URL to customize the bot that you are running from.

-Audio Upload System
Similar to image upload system but for the audio that the bot produces. Audio can only be uploaded via file.

Gameplay Warnings:


-Flashing Lights

-Blood/Gore
Imbedded in the creation of each map to maintain a scary environment.

-Loud Noises
Volume options do exist but the bots are naturally loud.

content_descriptors.notes: The mature content that exists within NexBox is meant to be unnerving and possibly disturbing, but there is an obvious disconnect from realism.

short_description: Your plane of existence has shattered, making perfect entry for anomalous figures to invade. Welcome to NexBox, a streamlined experience for anyone looking to run from Nexbots. All you have to do is upload an image and sound of your choice or choose the ones we have made.
